title: Every Season of American Horror Story Ranked! (Murder House to AHS: 1984)
author: GameSpot Universe
comment: What does your American Horror Story Top 9 look like? (there are no wrong answers)
I don’t get why people had an issue with Gaga on Hotel. She wasn’t a bad actress, she did a pretty good job actually.
AHS is like pizza, even if a season is considered "bad" its still pretty good.
so tired of this fanbases disrespecting hotel it's a great season
How dare you talk about Asylum and not mention Lily Rabe as Sister Mary Eunice?
description:
From worst to best, here are our ultimate power rankings for all nine seasons of American Horror Story!

Everyone has a different ranking when it comes to AHS. Greg and Ryan share their different individual rankings, then combine for GameSpot Universe's ultimate AHS Power Rankings! For each season, we ranked them by considering specific criteria: the plot, the characters, originality, and replay value. 

We took a deeper look at each season - Season 1 - Murder House, Season 2 - Asylum, Season 3 - Coven, Season 4 - Freak Show, Season 5 - Hotel, Season 6 - Roanoke, Season 7 - Cult, Season 8 - Apocalypse, Season 9 - 1984, and analyze the storyline, cast, best moments, worst moments, and replay-ability  of each one.  

We know that there will be a lot of disagreement about this ranking and we welcome it! Please jump into the comments and let us know what you think and tell us your rankings as well.

Subscribe to GameSpot Universe!
